title: The High Note
description: Set in the dazzling world of the LA music scene comes the story of Grace Davis, a superstar whose talent, and ego, have reached unbelievable heights. Maggie is Grace’s overworked personal assistant who’s stuck running errands, but still aspires to her childhood dream of becoming a music producer. When Grace’s manager presents her with a choice that could alter the course of her career, Maggie and Grace come up with a plan that could change their lives forever.

reviews.text: Perfectly easy-breezy whatever fluff. Dakota Johnson still charming in anything that isn’t the “50 Shades” movies...

Because of the poor marketing I really thought this was going to suck pretty bad but it was actually quite decent.It lacked a bit more solidity and also better music but personally I didn't see it as a boring experience.
